column4: anyone knows if this program is open sourced?http://www.gigaget.com/
it appears that you can only download .exe files, which are executable Microsoft Windows binaries.  a good rule of thumb is "can I download the tar.gz file?"
download managers of that sort are generally considered anti-net etiquette.  without being able to see the source it's just a "block box" program whose behavior might not be net-friendly.
kget is a good KDE program to manage downloads.
